Review_Text: The apartment was lovely and a great location however I had no check in instructions even once I arrived as the host hadn‚Äôt replied to me.
Not as advertised. Should stay 5 people but only one room with one double bed
Love Liverpool, we went for our wedding anniversary, we did a treasure hunt which was good fun
Great location!

Right in the heart of the city! Great location for anyone looking to see the late night attractions of Liverpool, of which there are many.Easy to book, easy to access, and easy to get anywhere else with transport links to the wider Liverpool area.As some other users have said: the noise is definitely there. You‚Äôre right on Mathew Street so expect to hear the nightlife, especially at weekends.
Its a clean and well maintained place with a very good fit out. But be aware that it is a central location in the middle of the night life and extremely noisy till the small hours.
The Airbnb is located in the centre of everything it is a beautiful apartment
My stay was okey. They took a lot of time to respond to my questions If you are searching for a quiet place, don‚Äôt come here

The host was approachable and flexible, but this place is incredibly noisy, with loud music from nearby bars going on well into the night. Not really an appropriate place to stay unless you're planning on going out yourself every night.
Apartment not really like in the pictures, everything else pretty good

!!AVOID!! Booked to stay at this property in Liverpool for an overnight stay however this stay was never actually encountered. Having booked the property twice due to an error, I was able to cancel one of the reservations whilst still keeping the other through the reassurance of air bnb themselves. When it came to the actual day of the stay I had contacted the property regarding the possibility of an early check in. Despite providing proof that I still reserved and paid for the stay, Peter and his incompetent team disregarded all of the proof and said there was no reservation under my name on their system lol and there was nothing they could do even though I had the booking confirmation of the stay on my phone which was already paid for. So if you‚Äôre looking to get scammed and stranded in Liverpool, I would highly recommend properties under Peter and his team :)

If you are a very fit party animal who likes to bang the rocks together till 3am, this might be the place for you. Otherwise beware. Nice enough flat, interesting location, good communication. Shame lift was out of order.

Good spot if you are staying for the night life, right around the corner from the Cavern and the other pubs. Close to food and shops, I recommend Casa Italia and Cosy Club. Our stay was comfortable and there was ample space for the two of us and new appliances. The unit could do with some fix ups like fresh paint.
We really enjoyed our stay. It was cozy!The perfect getaway with the nightlife of Liverpool at your doorstep.

Would not stay again despite the excellent location. We paid a ¬£100 deposit that we didn‚Äôt get back until a week later and only after chasing for it. They enforce the deposit but have no transparent process of the return or terms, which made the experience a bit paranoid overall. They ask for your bank information to return the deposit, which would‚Äôve been a hassle for me to get while on a vacation abroad. I went through Airbnb‚Äôs resolution centre to request the money back and they did return it. The check-in was already stressful and on top they gave us the wrong code for the door. It‚Äôs a self check-in, not in-person. The flat we had wasn‚Äôt pictured in the listing so it came as a surprise, though there is one pic that appears similar, I imagine it‚Äôs your luck of the draw whether you get the nice lofty ones. The communication with the company was inconsistent but someone from the company reached out via WhatsApp and it felt better to have a direct line to a human. He was very helpful and a relief!The unit itself was comfortable and spacious though a bit worn down (scratched walls, broken blinds, lamp missing it‚Äôs lightbulb.. the shower drain also stank), but we were only there for a short stay.  We took note of state of the apartment because of the deposit.We were told there is a ¬£50 charge to check out one hour later, and there was an option to leave your luggage at the Happy Days office on the other side of town if you have a late departure. It wasn‚Äôt worth it for us though. The location really is the draw, but there are plenty of nearby places we would try instead next time.
Absolutely awful stay hygiene was poor and the staff were unfriendly. Guys I recommend you don't stay here.
The apartment is perfectly located, clean and perfect for a stay in Liverpool.
Nice place in the heart of the city. Surrounding area is a bit loud

A pleasant apartment in the heart of Liverpool‚Äôs nightlife area, very close to clubs, bars and shops. Due to this location, it is very noisy until late and then quite noisy from early in the morning.The pictures are also NOT the apartment we ended up with. It is not mentioned in the description that we could end up in a ‚Äòsimilar apartment‚Äô. Though nice, the apartment we ended up in was not as nice as the pictures being advertised. The pictures clearly show a character-filled loft style apartment whereas we were put in a first floor white-washed apartment, directly in line with the streetlights. This was an issue as the blinds on the bedroom are very thin and let a lot of light in.However, the kitchen is very well furnished and would be great for an extended stay. The bathroom was very good and the beds comfy. If you are coming for the location and only using this as a base, it will serve you well.

The best location; everything you need is at a walking distance from the flat because of how central it is. The flat itself was spacious, clean and well-equipped - great for the price!Two things to be aware of is that the flat advertised is not the flat you are guaranteed (although the flat we were given was lovely and very similar interior wise). Secondly, as mentioned in the listing, the street is pretty loud at night due to how central it is, so although this was not a problem for us, it is something to keep in mind.
Amazing location but flat did not look like pictures. Made me doubt that ‚ÄòPeter and Joanna‚Äô exist. However, not bad value for money. Bring coffee and tea as none is provided.
Was very clean, good location and affordable price !!

It was a good place to stay. In the room I was staying in the window didn‚Äôt lock and the shared bathroom on the top floor had mold and excessive lime scale, it didn‚Äôt feel like a clean showering environment. The room was also dusty. But other than that it was well located, had all the amenities and Athena was easy to communicate with.
it was a very nice stay, very convenient to be close to public transport. Good room. Thank you very much

Positives: Good location in central London and close to a subway station.Moderately clean,Responsive HostNegatives: apartment that needs a good refresh (very damaged hardwood floors, putty on the walls, completely blackened kitchen ceiling, shower joints to be redone, very noisy bathroom ventilation that can be heard from the bedroom)The bed base is distorted (hole on one side) we did not sleep very wellit was also extremely hot in the room while we are in the spring.Poor value for the money
Easy check-in, easy transportation, affordable price.

The bedroom and bed are clean and comfortable, common areas are clean but a little decadent. In particular, we had an electricity issue the morning of our departure. Other than that, the hosts are very nice and leave everything you need to cook.
easy & fast check-in and check-out
Everything good except cleanliness .
Room that has everything you need, kitchen is well equipped, very central and good price for London standards. Host is very helpful and responds right away.

Great communication from Jes√∫s, the location is very good- just ten minutes walking from the centre. We arrived at midnight but because of self check in with a lockbox that wasn't any issue.  The room is basic, doesn't have a real window and could do with a fresh paint but very good when you consider the price you are paying, especially for a bathroom included. Pastora allowed us to have the spare set of keys so that we could have a pair each and came to check up on us to check that everything was good. The terrace is with it's great views is a nice bonus.The only negative we found was the cleaning, the floor was a bit dirty, and although the sheets were clean we found some hairs in them. The bathroom shower curtain was full of black mould on the inside at the bottom, also the bath mat was tiny and could not absorb all the water- it could do with replacing. All in all a good place for few nights in the centre of Granada, especially if you are just planning to shower and sleep.

- Jesus is friendly and responsive- if you are traveller and you only looking for a place to sleep this will be a good deal for you, but if you gonna spend time other than the sleeping time then I don‚Äôt think it wont be your best choice.- the roof is nice and you can see Alhambra (It might be also a good option if you don‚Äôt want sit in the room)- bathroom is clean and usable- the location is nice and you can walk around it to see beautiful sights.
perfect location to visit Granada, spaces that are a little small but suitable for spending one or two nights. Clean and very characteristic.

Very friendly welcome and instruction. The roof terrace overlooking the Alhambra and the location in the Albaicin on the border with Sacromonte are top class! Everything is within walking distance.Unfortunately, the mattress was so saggy and inclined to the middle that you could not lie straight for two. Next time I would ask for another room/separate mattresses.
Simple but cozy accommodation, clean, well presented. A light should be implemented in the bathroom. The owner communicates quickly with the traveler, friendly staff. No problem
the place was smaller, but it was definitely enough for our short visit. Votes, kettles, soap, and mugs provided. Cute accommodations.

We rented a junior room on the top floor of the building and an apartment,in the room my little one and I were staying in the room,and it was very very small, the tiny "bathroom", maybe enough for a guest, the shower had an old curtain and it should be changed,since the old mold stains do not give a feeling of cleanliness, it also doesn't help much since the water comes out when you showered,and maybe x that,there was a smell of humidity,especially when you closed the door and you came back in the afternoon.Two towels and one hand might not be enough,as one of the towels needed it to dry the floor and prevent the plastic from getting wet from the floor.In the apartment, it should be noted that you hear a lot of noise being on the street,however in the room it was very quiet, the only thing that when there are guests in the next room,you have to sleep when the others go to bed,and if they cook everything comes into your room,since it gives direct to the room.
We have been very comfortable in the accommodation.

The room does not have a bathroom door, which made it very uncomfortable to use. Common areas are filled with dirt and have a heavy cigarette smell. There is no direct bus left in front of the airbnb. In fact, you have to walk a very steep slope to find the house. The floor of the room is not level and the shower is not working well - the water pressure is very bad. The WiFi was working very badly: it was barely connected and the internet signal and the phone reception was leaving constantly. I don't recommend it.
Tiny bedroom, one curtain separates toilet bedroom

if you're traveling alone and want an experience it's definitely worth the money. but unfortunately with a kid it was too small for us. the host lady speaks only Spanish and is lovely. she'll try her best to communicate. the place could have been cleaner. and needs renovation. but otherwise the view and location is super awesome.
The stay was great, close to everything you need.
The entrance is on the right, as is the lockbox. Pablo is very helpful.

The Bedroom is located in a charming Andalusian house with its patio. Everything is clean and dust-free. Sure, the room is small and not very bright but it was enough for us to sleep there. The terrace allowed us to eat on the small table.The house is ideally located at the gates of the Sacromonte with right in front of the Rinc√≤n del Chapiz where we had all our breakfasts at a more than correct price (good and hearty).
A really nice stay. Happy with the rooftop terrace, as well as private bathroom/toilet
The room was practical and the place well located to walk around Albaic√≠n and visit the Alhambra. Although we didn't meet Jesus, his mother received us and was very kind! :)
It is quiet is well placed, but it is airy just through the window of the door that overlooks the landing

Good value for money. Located in one of the most touristic parts of the city. Clean home. Check in and Check out simplified. Jesus responds quickly and with a lot of accuracy. On the other hand, it is complicated to access for those who are driven (for parking and street access).
Nice silent house in touristic area. Small bedroom with private bathroom. Access is done by separate part of the house. Also really chill balcony with cool view.
top
good value, nice place, a tight room with a window as a part of the door is not too comfortable, no direct light but the terrace and patios are lovely!
Jesus' mother was very caring and pleasant. The house is very well located, nice, very simple and basic. A very nice shared terrace.  Good place for my one-night stay.

The room is somewhat damp (I was hit by rainy days) has a heater and a small kettle (no cups/glasses).The bathroom is inside the same room. So when bathing, the room is equally wet.It is very well located, and easily accessible.The litter is comfortable, and has enough clothes so it doesn't get cold.
Unbeatable location and lovely house
very good location. It‚Äôs too cold staying in the room even though the heater is on.

Very well located, moderately comfortable and poorly insulated, we were cold (there is a heater but it makes a lot of light because it heats up in the light). However, very good hosting and very good price given its location (everything is done on foot and that's great!)

You will have access to a bedroom with the very strict necessities: a bed, 2 towels, a sink, a shower, a coat rack, shower product and that's it. No windows on the outside. The shared terrace is not very pleasant and seems a little abandoned despite the partial view of the Alhambra.The room has no comfort. The exteriors are not very nice. It's in a pretty good location and inexpensive, these are the 2 perks. It's very cold in the room.

Everything was fine, I only stayed 1 night, but for me the only uncomfortable thing is that the bathroom has no door and is in front of the bed. It is a nice, clean and well located place for those who want to walk the historic center of Granada.

Charming house, just like the pictures . When we arrived , at 12:36 pm the reception was not very good on the part of the woman who was limoing . A little bitter He told us without being the best way he didn't get in until one , that he had to disinfect, and as is . Well, I don't disinfect if we find a bloody tampon underneath the bed. I wouldn't have said this if she had been nicer at the entrance. On the other hand, the situation is great . With a parking lot that's worth 15 on the day . It's a room for a short stay, I think .

Oreste is one of the friendliest people I've ever met, likes to chat and share amazing experiences. The breakfast he prepared for us (included in the price) was very convenient. Both check-in and check-out were flexible. The location of the apartment puzzled us a little at the beginning, but at the time of being there, you just have to be aware like anywhere else. Would stay again with Oreste definitely.

We were very well received, everything we were offered was granted. A place very close to the center, however on the streets we didn't feel so safe.Our host made us aware of everything and showed us a great place to eat, he also provided a great omelette and good company.
Oreste was friendly, helpful.
The accommodation is conveniently locatedOreste is very attentive and concerned about your stay being pleasant Highly recommended
We arrived after the time we had said and there was no problem at all. The clarifications to arrive very clearly for anyone. Great host, very friendly and attentive.
a whole character, very attentive, sociable, includes breakfast, I would recommend ordering the apartment in general at least when I have the visits,best regards!

Oreste was a very good attentive host, warm, with very good discussions and responsive to our needs. It makes us feel comfortable and at home. The apartment is near the center so walking distance is convenient. The room is clean, the common areas are a little less and I would have liked to have been notified for cockroaches in the kitchen. Other than that, very convenient for a short stay and good value for money.

Oreste is a great host, he was very attentive when checking in and out and we didn't go during the morning. He served us very good scrambled egg Turkish coffee in the mornings and provided us with a few bottles of water. Very communicative and excellent conversation.The perfectly acclimatized apartment is shared living room-kitchen and bathroom with him where a little more cleaning was missing. The room was very nice, with sheets, blanket and towels for the guests, but you have to add that there were things from the owner in the room and the bed somewhat uncomfortable.The location is good, 25 minutes away from the main square and quiet neighborhood.Value would definitely recommend.
For the price you can't miss big. but clean is different. Oreste is very nice, though a little strange. As a woman, I would like to stay here because of the situation.
Oreste is a great host! Nice place to stay for a short time. We would be happy to be back!

This is a good value stay, cleaning and atmosphere isn't always the best but you get good value for the prize. Oreste is a good and accomodating host, who provides nice and personalised breakfast.Location is good and easily accessible from the inner city. Plenty of restaurants around the block are open until late.It is worth noting that Oreste is a smoker, so you should beforehand express wishes that he does not smoke indoors during your stay if this is something that bothers you. Oreste was very helpful and smoked outside the apartment building when we were inside. The apartment has good ventilation so any smells are quick to disappear and the smoke doesn't reach into the room for rent.
I won't go back there. I prefer to have a hostel in a clean room for less. I don't recommend it.
Good talk, good cook, a good place to spend the night.
Oreste is a smart person, very friendly and helpful. Make a very good breakfast. The location 25 min from the historic center. It's better than what you see in photos. I recommend 100%

So here is my two cents on Oreste‚Äôs place. He‚Äôs a sweet heart of a guy, very friendly and nice. The place is just not up to my living standards. If you‚Äôre like me, and just want a cheap place to crash, then it‚Äôll do for a night. The place is clearly in one of the lower socioeconomic areas of Brussels. Inside the apartment, it‚Äôs a bit gross. Did I find roaches and rats-no I did not, but there‚Äôs just something about the place that isn‚Äôt the cleanest, but again if you just want a cheap place then I guess it will do.Oreste is great. He made sure the bedding was clean, gave me a clean towe, and made me breakfast (scrambled eggs with cheese) and coffee. The breakfast was not good, but it was a kind gesture and free, so hard to complain. Just be prepared of what you‚Äôre walking into. It‚Äôs not a nice place, but it‚Äôll do for one night if you‚Äôre traveling on a budget.

Oreste is very interesting and likes to talk with people he knew a lot about culture and language. He is very helpful for check in and check out time which helped us a lot. But to be honest the room is not clean enough. He smoked so there is some smoke smell in the house although he opened the window for the whole day we can still smell it. The  wll of the bedroom has mold and  some smell of moist. Considing the price it is ok.
Room with space, oreste was friendly and helped us up with the bags. There is no elevator in the building and it smells like fish, but we were very welcome!
Oreste is a very funny guy!
Oreste is a very friendly guy and very flexible with the check-in and check-out time. Price is very affordable.

The place is a bit far from Beekkant and it‚Äôs closer to √àtangs Noirs. If you don‚Äôt have internet on your phone, it‚Äôs better to have a map or remember the address, especially when it‚Äôs night. The host is kind and funny. He knows about history and he is curious at culture. We have discussed a lot. He made a breakfast every morning and gave a private room with double bed! It‚Äôs really reasonable to stay for a few days!

Oreste was a great host. Communicated very well with us and helped us find our way into the city! I would recommend him for a quick stop in Brussels. His breakfast was delicious and let us have a late check in.

Great location, close to the city centre. Oreste is available to offer tips to his guests and answer any questions they may have. He let us check-in early and also made us breakfast before we left the next day! Highly recommend.
Good experience, Oreste is a great host and talker. I recommend his place. Merci Oreste.
A normal option, budgeted against the backdrop of Brussels prices. We spent one night, in the morning we fed a delicious breakfast. Upon arrival, tea

Oreste is a very friendly, unique host who really cares about his guests! His place is about 20-30min walk to the centre of Brussels so we had no issues getting around by foot. The neighbours were intermittently loud until 10-11pm so if you are a light/ early sleeper we would suggest ear plugs. Through the night it was quiet and the bed was comfortable- much better than the pictures!

The room is exactly the one in the photos, it's big and spacious. He sleeps great on that mattress and the pillows are comfortable. We had a great welcome from Oreste with whom we were able to chat a bit of very varied and interesting subjects:) I highly recommend this place!! It's about a 20-minute walk from downtown and really for the price it has... unbeatable!

The apartment is perfect when you stop in Brussels and you have to stay, it is close to the downtown area, which you access without a problem, Our Host stood out for the helpful and good character with its guests, It is a good price/Room ratio.
Cool
Very welcoming host,  the apartment is quite close to the center.

Our stay at Oreste's was fine. He's behaved like a true host. Upon arrival he invited us to dinner and we had diverse conversations. The room is fine, no noise, but a little messy. Otherwise, I would recommend to other future transports to be at Oreste's house

Oreste is friendly. He cooked breakfast for me everyday and we even shared dinner together. The room was okay however the neighbourhood was a bit unsafe to walk alone at night provided the streets were dim and the shops closed early. Overall my stay at there was pleasant with this great hosr
Oreste very friendly and nice, good for one night,if you are very demanding with cleanliness it is not the right place for you
Thank you

Oreste was very welcoming and accommodating. Asked about things he could do to make my stay more comfortable, gave me recommendations for sites to see provided tea, coffee, water and breakfast. Quite a value for the price! What was lacking in amenities should be expected from such a low price. I will say that if you are a solo female traveler and/or like to keep to yourself you may want to reconsider.

The apartment is very close to the center, on foot about 20 min. Oriste (host) is very friendly and kind. All you have to do is ask and he will arrange everything. Very communicative. Made us breakfast. Met late at night. However, you should know that although the price is lower than the market price, you will have to sleep without a pillow(or rather a piece of sheet stuffed with a password) and under a blanket without a pillowcase. It is also worth paying attention to the area in which to find an apartment, it is better to read about it in advance.

Oreste was very nice and helpful host. He was making sure that we weren't hungry or thirsty. He made good breakfast :) It was nice to spend some time with him and we had good conversations. He gave us tips what we should see in Brussels.Apartment is okay and the bedroom is spacious with comfy bed. We got good night sleep even though the neighbourhood can be a little bit noisy from time to time. We can recommend this place and Oreste as a host. He even took our laundry to the laundry place! He is really taking care of his guests and the price is very good :)
It was ok :) thx Oreste for everything.

Oreste is a fantastic host. He made us feel welcome from the moment we entered the appartment.We also enjoyed the conversations we had.He nicely provided us with some breakfast and gave some tips on what to do in the city)Hope to see you again!
Oreste was friendly and always try to make me feel like home. :) Closed to centre and railway station. Neighbour was a little noise but it was fairly well for short term stay and price:D

Oreste was very nice and welcoming. He always asked if we need anything and prepared us a breakfast. Place was OK, but we couldn't expected more for the money. It was situated in muslims neighbourhood, but we didn't have any problem with it.

We actually did not meet Oreste since he was away when we came. However he communicated promptly and left keys with his neighbour  so everything was ok. The room/flat is what you expect from the offer - fine enough to sleep and cook some food. The neighbourhood is nice and safe and really close to the centre by foot. Downstairs there is a great shop with fresh seafood and meat for very reasonable prices:)Thank you very much Oreste! We enjoyed...

Orestes is a very warm and generous person, he welcomed us and was a good host. I recommend it for anyone who doesn't want to spend too much, and it's close on foot and by metro to the tourist center.
I stayd really well oreste is really gentle and lovely personIt is the right compromise for 10 euros :) what more do you want? Recommended for those who are curious about life
The place was near the city center, you can walk. The room is small but cozy. The host is polite and hospitable, fed us.
Good place and very close to downtown, it smells a little bad when going out for a butcher shop that is next door, but for the price it's great!
Oreste is a very intelligent, kind, and helpful person. The flat is well located and easy to reach. He provided me everything I needed and always asked if I wanted food :) Thanks again Oreste!!!

I really enjoyed my stay at Oreste's home, he was very carefully and it was a pleasure to talk with him like i do with a friend. He provided me everything I needed, even invited me to have breakfast together. The price is  really a bargain and if you look for a place to rest in the evening is the best location.

Orestes is a thoughtful host and an atypical person. The neighborhood doesn't look good but the room has an excellent value.Thank you for welcoming me so warmly, for being such good company and for letting me see your world a little bit!
Everything went well, Oreste is very nice as a person and respectful. Thank you

We are a couple who stayed 2 nights in Oreste house, upon arrival I was waiting for us at the agreed time but the experience was not good. Lack of hygiene in general in the house and especially in the bathroom in general and especially in the bathroom. We do not use the kitchen for this reason.  On the first day we arrived from visiting the city at 23 h and I do not let us shower because I did not want us to make noise for the neighbors. He gave us some keys that the key to the portal didn't work and we depended on him being there to open us and we had to arrange arrival time so he was there to open and still we had to wait half an hour on the street. It is 20 minutes from the historic center and if you have a small budget more than one night I would not stay. Even so, good treatment and kind.

Oreste is a nice and polite person. I checked in very late and that was not problem for him. I was warmly welcome by him, although I had not opportunity to talk with him for a long time, he seemed very friendly. The room is nice, especially king size bed, which is good for solo travelers. Location is also good, 5 minutes to the nearest metro station, from which you easily get everywhere in Brussels. The price is also convenient, so I'd recommend everyone to stay at Oreste's place.
Location is good, 5 minutes walk to metro station. To the center takes 30 minutes something. I didn't meet him personally, I heard that he doesn't live at this apt at the moment.
Very kind person, the place is just like in the pic. 15 or 20 minute walk to the center

Oreste was a really kind and friendly guy. We came late at night and Oreste was up and he also gave us breakfast both mornings of our stay.The room is what's expected for ‚Ç¨10 and we were happy to find somewhere so cheap. Its worth noting me and my friend (both females aged 19) didn't feel safe in the neighbourhood at night; there aren't any women out and some of the men were a bit threatening, so if staying just make sure you don't walk around too late if you're a woman on your own.Other than that a good, cheap stay :)
The host is a kind and friendly person.
Oreste is so kind !! everything is good !!
Hi Orestes, The stay was beautiful ,we had a good time,  it was nice,  helpful Really it was good trip. Thank you Oreste. I would recommend it.

Orestes is a very nice man and tells me the moment that I arrived how to find his place. The room is clean with a large tv. I slept like an angel. The street is close to the metro. You can take the bus or walk 10 minutes to the metro station. There are also shops and we can take a bus to Rue Brabant. By metro, direct to the center of Brussels and is so fast. Downstairs, in the center,a lot to do! At Orestes, he can help us in the possible way: If you want to know something,it's good to ask because the host can't read what we want. He is kind and after asking, he is ready to help us! Don't forget to ask if you want to know,need something.
Oreste was incredibly welcoming, we had a good time and a nice discussion together.
Oreste was welcoming. We had interesting conversations and he made us pizza!

Oreste was most hospitable and made us feel at home right from the start. The poor guy gave us his bed and slept on the kitchen floor and refrained from smoking although he's a hardened smoker when he was told we didn't smoke. He also played the drum for us as a farewell gesture!!! However, the neighborhood is effectively the "Hood" i.e. a bit sketchy (or colorful), depending on how you see things and I would advise a low profile when arriving late at night.

Very clear instructions to enter the room and the host is very responsive if you need anything. Room is small but cosy, though the shower is not the most effective lol. Great neighborhood.Overall, perfect for a single traveler looking for a few days in Paris !

The location is very nice, with many metro stations around. The room is small, but this is not a problem. The only sink, that one can use, is also in this small room and it is under a shelf, so one cannot even properly wash his face or brush his teeth. The shower is also extremely small and there is enough hot water for 3 min wash, so if you have long hair be prepared for a cold shower. It definitely doesn't cost the money the owner asks for it.Ah, I forgot to mention the toilet, which can't be locked and it is shared with a neighbour.

The property is in a top location with numerous cafes and restaurants. Even though the room is small and you are not allowed to be too big for the shower cabin, it is very nicely furnished and cozy overall. Everything was very clean, the mattress very comfortable and the house is very quiet so you can sleep well at night.

this was a perfect little room for a solo traveller ! a great location with lots to do in the neighbourhood and easily accessible. Fredric was quick to respond and gave clear instructions :) i felt very cozy as there was lots of things provided . would recommend for a short stay & would come again! merci encore

The place has really nice Parisian vibes. Checking in and out was pretty okay because it is no-contact. Although I don‚Äôt quite understand why do I need to clean after myself when I paid the cleaning fee:/Also the shower was small for me üòÖ I had to wash my hair and my body separately. Also Wi-Fi doesn‚Äôt work at night which is really weird. And going to the bathroom is a bit cumbersome because you have to close the door each time and it‚Äôs not the easiest task. But overall, I really liked staying in the room ‚ù§Ô∏èThe district is pretty clean and safe in comparison with other parts of Paris.

Positive:nice appartment, good location, price was fine.Negative:mind 6th floor without lift. I found a communication style of the owner a bit specific. Just to give an example: a note ,,Do not eat on my bed,, is one of many how to use the toilet, shower etc. Wifi was not working one day. A toilet is outside of the apartment.Generally for one or two nights is fine.

He responded quickly and it was helpful! He put small Christmas gift on bed:) but the place was on 6th floor and without elevator. And getting inside was hard. But except for that everything was good !

There are a couple things that I think should be mentioned explicitly in the listing:* The shower's usable space is 3√ó5 feet (90√ó150 cm) at the ground level, and 3x1.5 feet (90√ó45 cm) at the head level (look at the photos.  The taller you are, the more uncomfortable it is. If you're above 6'3", taking a shower is gonna be a nightmare. * There's no shower holder, so you gotta hold it with one hand and wash yourself with the other one.* there are no outlets near the microwave, so every time you wanna use it you gotta take it out of the cupboard, put it on the ground,  plug it in, use it, unplug it, and put it back in again.* 6th floor and no elevator (~120-ish stairs).* The sink is blocked by a piece of wood, so you can't really shave or wash your face there (look at the photos).* the building is old and a bit smelly.I just feel the listing information was not accurate and complete enough. I'm adding these to make sure the others can see them before booking it.
Price to review compared to the proposed space

Fr√©d√©ric was very kind and responded quickly to the need! Bedroom on the 6th floor, to be considered if you have no fitness, but it is done!!! Small nice room and close to several metro stations, easy to get around from the accommodation! Thank you Fr√©d√©ric for the stay!!:)
Good

The apartment was clean, quiet and located in a great area in Paris. For a single traveller, this apartment was ideal as it had everything I needed. However, I would place an emphasis on the fact that this apartment is very small. The shower is small and quite cramped, and may be an issue for those who are particularly tall.

The room is perfect when you travel alone. It has everything you need and is located in a very good area which is also close to the center of Paris. Fred is a good host, very nice and helpful. I would definatly book the room again and recommend it to others.

A lot of info is missing in the description. The room is tiny and the bathroom is located in public hallway. Shower is extremely inconvenient and it is impossible to use towel inside especially if you are tall. I still managed to do so and left the wood floor clean and dry.The host will bombard you with tones of instructions which i followed to the best of my abilities. Yet, i received a request for 20 euro for disinfection of supplementary items. On top of hefty cleaning fee for a room of 6 sq. m. I have made images of all corners of the room that proof i left it nice and clean (granted sheets have to be changed). Yet, it feels extremely frustrating that the host is now harassing me with extra fees for cleaning.
This was a cute Air BnB in a good area. Fred was very good at communicating! It is on the smaller side, even for a Parisian Studio, so would only be good for a few days. Thanks for the nice stay!

The room was probably a storage closet that was converted into a tiny bedroom. It's very unpractical if you're going to spend a couple days in Paris. The place is extremely overpriced for the location, and basic necessities like extra toilet roll aren't provided. Cuttlery wasn't washed, and the sink (which only works for hot water) is under an unpractical table which makes it impossible to wash your face with. I also started to itch after sleeping in the bed. I would not recommend this place simply because I feel like it's a rip-off for unwitting tourists. The overall decor is nice in the photos on here, but that's it.

Great location, room is just as tiny as advertised but very charming. Host was very communicative and had some great tips for the area. 6 floors without a lift is a bit of a climb, but you get used to it.
Lovely place, good host

Good stay in this small accommodation. Sometimes you have to use ingenuity given the size of the room, but the main thing is there: in a good location, quiet, price. I do not recommend if you are tall.
It was an enjoyable experience The space is neat and compact. It was everything that I needed. The location was wonderful and the local community was positive and upbeat. Great vibes
Good little room. Very meticulously decorated. The space is small but it is cozy and makes for a cool memorable experience.
It was OK! I would say it corresponds to what it is announced

Excellent value for money, like hospitality. Ideally located and sufficient to sleep alone. On the other hand, expect a very small place of 6 m2 where the essentials are present. Very quiet, and it's a plus in Paris, except for the noise from the toilet shared with the student of the neighboring studio.
Lovely cosy studio strategically located.Merci Frederic!
A beautiful little room in a lovely area, Thanks fred!
A cozy and pleasant small room. Thank you Frederick.

The apartment is cute, but I had a lot of issues with the host during check-in and after checkout. i was waiting for him 40 min on the street in a 37 degree heat and he did not answer my messages and did not answer my calls .After the checkout sent me messages, they want to charge me an extra fee because the rug in front of the shower was wet!!!
He was very quick to respond and accurate before check-in.One thing to say is that the shower will be gone soon.Great location and access.

It's unfortunate that the photos are misleading. The place is VERY small, without a fridge, with the shower inside the room (minimum) and the bathroom outside. There are 6 floors per staircase, and it would be practical to know in advance. Anyway, I spent some time "recalculating" until I understood the place I had arrived at, but I would have preferred to know it sooner so I could decide
Overfull
small room but everything is there, the neighborhood is nice and quiet, good amenities, good bedding, host available... small downside... the shower under a roof slope quite narrowbalance

Room was fine but very small, difficult to make your toilet. The 6th floor without elevator is also a problem. This was only mentioned later.Because he had to leave urgently, he asked me to take a taxi that he would pay back later, 10‚Ç¨ did not happen.He would also provide an organic breakfast on 12/31, didn't happen.
Fr√©d√©ric is a very nice host. The tiny room is certainly "tiny" but very cozy, and a very good one for a short trip to Paris. Special mention to the particularly comfortable bed.
Very cozy and friendly apartment. Lots of attention!!

It's not like the pictures. It's the worst. I asked the host to switch to the same room as the picture, but they said they booked this room and were unfriendly. The room had no privacy at all and it was all about having 7 beds in one room. Later, we will book somewhere else, even if we give more money.
The place is not good and only

My stay at the Grand Hostel Berlin was a mixed bag. I would like to start with the hospitality. Staff were responsive, nice and helpful. When checking in it was quick and they dealt with everything excellently. The service I received especially at the bar was excellent! However the hostel was overbooked resulting in me loosing my initial room as I was moved to a new room. When I finally observed the rooms they were nothing like the pictures. They are single beds, with no privacy in dusty rooms. The toilets were terrible, the showers were on a 1 - 2 minute timer and there was only one toilet per floor. The prices for drinks and anything in general at the hostel is  excessive I would recommend you go elsewhere for drinks. The location is above average being so close to a metro. The price is nothing special and you could get better hostels in Berlin for the same price. The take away is +Great staff +Wonderful service- terrible rooms-booking mistakes-expensive
Dirty bathroom, lots of noise, you couldn't rest, you had to rent towels. Not worth it

From the description I expected a rather high-end hostel which turned out to be a complete disaster. Old and dirty showers with cold water.  A guest waking everyone up aggressively loud at 1am because he wasn't able to check in as planned. Everything felt old such as the sofas in the common area that were all broken. Slow wifi as well. Altogether a very disappointing experience. One thing is sure - I will not return.

The man at the reception was very sweet and helpful and supported us, the check-in was very flexible. However, the place wasn't even like the pictures. We were all so shocked, because of anteroom, mirror and bathroom... on the beds there was dust everywhere. the beds and furniture look very high quality in the pictures, in really unfortunately only poorly painted and cheap. When we came back in the evening, there was an older man who resembles a homeless person in a bed of ours... how did he get in? Safety issue? However, we were assisted by the front desk and he was referred out of the room and the bed directly newly covered.
This lousy, my Nintendo was stolen and they don't want to be held responsible.

The photos do not reflect reality. Socializing and common living areas were not very pleasing to people. Even though there are people you can socialize with, you feel worthless in this place. I even got warnings about no smoking outside the door, but then I saw others smoking too. I did not find what I expected. Amsterdam is an inviting city, but this place is not. I suggest you don't set your expectations too high. It was an inhuman experience.

The room was really really small and I think the bathroom and the kitchen would never be cleaned, it was so dirty. I thought ok for 9‚Ç¨ per night it's ok but then he wants more money after I have gone. And for the price you can find much better room's.
ALERT!!!  Do not stay here, they will steal you and the host is not a responsible person. ALERT!!!!

This place is what you can expect for the price. The pool is not usable, it looks more like a pond.  The room is very warm without a window.  We were bitten by mosquitoes and other bugs the entire time we were there.  The common areas deserve to be renovated.Positive part : the young woman who runs the hostel is very kind and does everything possible to help
For the price, it's fine...

The place was well located near the airport, there is room to park in the door but there are two things that surprised us, the room smelled of stale, both the sheets and cover and blankets smelled not to have been washed, the bathroom towels were half dirty with stains , apart from the smells and what disturbed us the most is that it has 1 or 2 cats to which I have an allergy and at no time I saw in the description that I had cats, just that it was animal friendly and that I think needs to be specified because less bad that we only stayed one day.

The place was not clean, in fact it was noticeable that it had not been cleaned for days. In the sink there was hair, humans and animals, dust, and stains of daily use that have been embedded. We were unable to make use of the shower, due to the condition of the shower.The kitchen, the same, is the remains of food, oil, which were still there without anyone having deigned to remove it. the depa in general is well located has an amazing view the only flaws there were it was that there was a lot of noise from the tenants, upstairs there were women's hairs in the bathroom,already when we were lying there was an alacran on the bed when we turned on the light it went down from the bed we had to move it to be able to kill it I wrote to the host  and I sent photos of the alacran and only left me in view anything else I could never connect to the Wifi i always said wrong password, I also comment and they didn't resolve anything  and there was a lack of toilet paper and the pillows smelled very bad we had to put some t-shirts on for the smell to disappear!

The rooms are not marked, I didn't find the little tab to put the key in and lock the room. There is no fan or air conditioner, so in order to avoid suffocation and leave breathing you need to leave the door open and you can hear all the music and scandal from the center. of the most unpleasant place is not recommended at all

I satayed here for nearly 3 weeks, I got charged maybe 3 times for the cleanning and the floor was always dusty everywhere, my linen smelled bad, On my check out, I was gonna stay at the end for a few nights more, When I asked Sarah, the very first answer was, haven‚Äôt you checked out? This air b&b could be great but the pictures are not honest there like a girl with great make up but she‚Äôs not that pretty when she takes it off. I had an extremely frustrating and unpleasant experience at this Airbnb. I got locked out of my room, and when I tried to contact the host for the lock code with the help of another guest, he was incredibly rude and unprofessional. Instead of offering any understanding or assistance, he told me to never call him again and suggested that I just wait outside if I got locked out again. While he did eventually provide the lock code, the way he handled the situation was unacceptable. I would never recommend this host to anyone. If you're looking for a stay where the host is courteous and responsive, look elsewhere. This experience was disappointing and stressful.

Worst experience with a host that I‚Äôve ever had. I didn‚Äôt stay here. Jack was discriminatory and rude beyond measure and it felt unsafe to be in that situation so I found a different Airbnb. Someone earlier mentioned serial killer vibes and I def got those, too. Stay salt folks.
Room is comfortable and definitely worth the price but I came in the summer and the A/C was absolutely horrible. Me and my partner barely slept and when we did we woke up sweaty and sticky .

The house needs to be actually clean every day just not the beds an bed sheets , house needs to be swept every day an carpets need to be vacuumed everything was filthy , showers had black dirt stains from never actually cleaning an scrubbing showers, showers where very filthy, showers would not drain right so you would have to wait on the water to drain from the previous person before jumping in the shower, restrooms had hair all over the floors, sinks and counter tops had toothpaste stains and hair all over, 1st Airbnb and most likely my last , I figured I would save money by using Airbnb but I would rather spend the extra on a hotel then stay in a dirty home

I couldn't go because I had the coronavirus 3 days ago, but they said they couldn't get a refund. The Air BnB policy is the same, and it's refundable up to 5 days before, so I think you should know well.

Be careful with a lot of cockroaches.It was serious to think that it was good value for money.I didn't see the review and booked it, but I even asked for cleanliness after checking it later.I started crawling in the bathroom at dawn.It came out of the refrigerator.I was glad I didn't choose to eat.Looking at the other people's reviews, it came out from the pot, but I don't think it's still managed to be this level.I made a reservation for two consecutive nights, but I came out to find a hotel where I could check in early after I spent money..
